pkgmetadata.longdescription: FF Proxy - Python Client========================FF includes a client library for use in Python projects.## InstallationThe python package `ff-client` can be installed with pip:```pip install ff-client```See latest versions [here](https://pypi.org/project/ff-client/)## UsageThe `FfClient` class provides the ability to send a HTTP request string to an FF proxy:```pythonfrom ff_client import FfClient, FfConfig, FfRequestimport loggingclient = FfClient( FfConfig( ip_address='127.0.0.1', port=8080, pre_shared_key='testkey', log_level=logging.DEBUG ))client.send_request('''GET / HTTP/1.1Host: google.com''',https=True)```
